About The Event

Shanon L.Adler once said : «  Life always begins with one step outside your comfort zone » That’s what OSSEC team is striving for : working on promoting open source not only in the national school of computer science but also in other tunisian schools . That’s why this team worked on organizing the first hackathon in ENSI , Tunihack , on 12 and 13 December .

Our Speakers

Rafik Dahmen

chief testing officer - Trust Testing Owner CEO - TESSAN Testing Conference Software Testing .

Mohamed Ali Charmi

Scrum Master - Sungard Software Engineer/Team Leader Conference AngularJS

Fabrice Epelboin

Co-Owner and Co-founder at Yogosha Professor at Sciences Po. Paris Conference The sharing economy and hackers

Mohamed Amine Bouhlel

Managing Director - Tunisia LINAGORA Tunisie Workshop OpenPaas

Haithem Abdelli
